title: Make a New Primitive Type
description: In this lab, you will create a new primitive type in Python.

meta.title: Mastering Custom Primitive Types in Python
meta.description: Discover how to create your own primitive data types in Python, unlocking new possibilities for your programs.
meta.keywords: custom data types, python, object oriented programming, mutable integers, primitive types
